Structs/RegistrationRequest.html#/s:18Mo.name: aliasId
Structs/RegistrationRequest.html#/s:18Mo.abstract: The created Mobilab alias for the payment method

Structs/RegistrationRequest.html#/s:18Mo.name: pspData
Structs/RegistrationRequest.html#/s:18Mo.abstract: Data about the PSP as fetched from Mobilab backend’s configuration

Structs/RegistrationRequest.html#/s:18Mo.name: viewController
Structs/RegistrationRequest.html#/s:18Mo.abstract: View controller which should be used as presenting view for UI related events in module

Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: apiVersion
Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The API version of the PSP to use

Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: hash
Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The hash to use with the PSP (used for BS Payone)

Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: merchantId
Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The id of the merchant associated with the key

Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: request
Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The request to perform when interfacing with the PSP

Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: responseType
Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The response type to use when interfacing with some PSPs (especially BS Payone)

Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: type
Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The type of payment service provider used.

Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: mode
Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The mode of the payment service provider. Example: test

Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: braintreeClientToken
Structs/PSPExtra.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The client token used for initializing Braintree SDK

Structs/SEPAData.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: bic
Structs/SEPAData.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The BIC (Bank Identifier Code) associated with the SEPA account

Structs/SEPAData.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: iban
Structs/SEPAData.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The IBAN (International Bank Account Number) associated with the SEPA account

Structs/SEPAData.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.name: billingData
Structs/SEPAData.html#/s:18MobilabPaymen.abstract: The billing data to use when registering the SEPA account with a payment service provider

Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.name: cvv
Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.abstract: The CVV associated with the credit card

Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.name: expiryMonth
Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.abstract: The month in which the credit card expires: 1 (January) - 12 (December)

Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.name: expiryYear
Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.abstract: The year in which the credit card expires: 0-99

Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.name: billingData
Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.abstract: The billing data to use when registering the credit card with the PSP

Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.name: holderName
Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.abstract: The name of the credit card holder. Not required by every PSP

Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.name: cardType
Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.abstract: The type of credit card (e.g. visa or mastercard) the number is associated with. This is determined on card initialization

Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.name: cardMask
Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.abstract: The card mask (i.e. last 4 digits) of the card number

Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.name: init(cardNumber:cvv:expiryMonth:expiryYear:holderName:billingData:)
Structs/CreditCardData.html#/s:18Mobilab.abstract: Initialize a new credit card. Validates credit card using Luhn’s algorithm - if the validation fails, an MLError is thrown

Structs/CreditCardData.html.name: CreditCardData
Structs/CreditCardData.html.abstract: CreditCardData contains all data necessary for registering a credit card with a payment service provider

Structs/SEPAData.html.name: SEPAData
Structs/SEPAData.html.abstract: SEPAData contains all data necessary for registering a SEPA account with a payment service provider

Structs/PSPExtra.html.name: PSPExtra
Structs/PSPExtra.html.abstract: Information about the used PSP retrieved from Mobilab payment backend.

Structs/RegistrationRequest.html.name: RegistrationRequest
Structs/RegistrationRequest.html.abstract: A struct including all information generated from starting payment method registration

Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.name: RegistrationResult
Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.abstract: A result obtained from registering a payment method with the PSP

Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.name: pspIdentifier
Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.abstract: The PSP identifier as required by the Mobilab payment backend

Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.name: handleRegistrationRequest(registrationRequest:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.abstract: Handle a request for registering a payment method with the PSP

Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.name: supportedPaymentMethodTypes
Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.abstract: All payment method types which module supports

Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.name: supportedPaymentMethodTypeUserInterfaces
Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.abstract: All payment method types for which the module provides user interface means of creating the data

Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.name: viewController(for:billingData:configuration:)
Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html#/s.abstract: Create a view controller allowing input of data for a given payment method type

Protocols/PaymentMethodDataProvider.html.name: didCreatePaymentMethodCompletion
Protocols/PaymentMethodDataProvider.html.abstract: A callback to call once the registration data is created

Protocols/PaymentMethodDataProvider.html.name: errorWhileCreatingPaymentMethod(error:)
Protocols/PaymentMethodDataProvider.html.abstract: A method that is called when an error occurs during payment method creation

Protocols.html#/s:18MobilabPaymentCore16.name: RegistrationData
Protocols.html#/s:18MobilabPaymentCore16.abstract: Data representing a payment method from the user’s view

Protocols/PaymentMethodDataProvider.html.name: PaymentMethodDataProvider
Protocols/PaymentMethodDataProvider.html.abstract: A type that can create registration data

Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html.name: PaymentServiceProvider
Protocols/PaymentServiceProvider.html.abstract: A protocol representing the behaviour a payment service provider (PSP) module should provide

Enums/ConfigurationError.html#/s:18Mobil.name: publicKeyNotSet
Enums/ConfigurationError.html#/s:18Mobil.abstract: The SDK’s public key is not set

Enums/ConfigurationError.html#/s:18Mobil.name: endpointNotValid
Enums/ConfigurationError.html#/s:18Mobil.abstract: The provided SDK endpoint is not a valid URL

Enums/ConfigurationError.html#/s:18Mobil.name: providerNotSet
Enums/ConfigurationError.html#/s:18Mobil.abstract: The SDK’s payment provider was not set

Enums/PaymentMethodType.html.name: PaymentMethodType
Enums/PaymentMethodType.html.abstract: PaymentMethodType: All payment method types that the SDK

Classes/RegistrationManager.html#/s:18Mo.name: registerPaymentMethodUsingUI(on:billingData:completion:)
Classes/RegistrationManager.html#/s:18Mo.abstract: Allow the user to select a payment method type and input its data from module-generated UI

Classes/MobilabPaymentSDK.html#/s:18Mobi.name: registerProvider(provider:forPaymentMethodTypes:)
Classes/MobilabPaymentSDK.html#/s:18Mobi.abstract: Register payment service provider to be used for registering supplied payment method types

Classes/MobilabPaymentSDK.html#/s:18Mobi.name: getRegistrationManager()
Classes/MobilabPaymentSDK.html#/s:18Mobi.abstract: Create a registration manager to use for registering payment methods

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: email
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: The email address associated with the billing data

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: name
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: The name of the person to bill

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: zip
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: The zip code associated with the billing data

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: city
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: The city name associated with the billing data

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: state
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: The state asscociated with the billing data

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: country
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: The country associated with the billing data

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: phone
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: The phone number associated with the billing data

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: languageId
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: The id of the language to use (e.g. deu)

Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.name: init(email:name:address1:address2:zip:city:state:country:phone:languageId:)
Classes/BillingData.html#/c:@M@MobilabPa.abstract: Initialize the billing data with select properties

Classes/MobilabPaymentConfiguration.html.name: loggingEnabled
Classes/MobilabPaymentConfiguration.html.abstract: Whether or not the SDK should write log messages to the console detailing the steps it takes

Classes/MobilabPaymentConfiguration.html.name: useTestMode
Classes/MobilabPaymentConfiguration.html.abstract: Whether or not the SDK should instruct the Mobilab backend to run in test mode

Classes/MLError.html#/c:@M@MobilabPaymen.name: title
Classes/MLError.html#/c:@M@MobilabPaymen.abstract: The error’s title. Provides some context to the error.

Classes/MLError.html#/c:@M@MobilabPaymen.name: errorDescription
Classes/MLError.html#/c:@M@MobilabPaymen.abstract: A string describing the error and reasoning for it

Classes/MLError.html.name: MLError
Classes/MLError.html.abstract: An error that occurred in the MobilabPaymentSDK

Classes/BillingData.html.name: BillingData
Classes/BillingData.html.abstract: The data identifying the billing data. Different payment service providers require different data to be present

Classes/RegistrationManager.html.name: RegistrationManager
Classes/RegistrationManager.html.abstract: Type used for registering payment methods of different types

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
